quote: Let me get you all some punch,” I said.“You're leaving us?” said Isabel, sounding panicky.“I'll be right back,” I promised. “If anyone comes near you, just scream and run.
quote_letters: LET ME GET YOU ALL SOME PUNCH I SAIDYOURE LEAVING US SAID ISABEL SOUNDING PANICKYILL BE RIGHT BACK I PROMISED IF ANYONE COMES NEAR YOU JUST SCREAM AND RUN
